name: Engager
body:
##Brief 
####“Engager” is a customer success application with one click deployment on Heroku. 

Customer success is an art that requires constant customer engagement. This engagement is usually done through static tools like surveys that don’t reflect the dynamic nature of your business. With the Heroku powered app “Engager” you can create incentives that reflect the information you need right now. 

Imagine a Dreamforce is forthcoming and you want to know which customers plan on attending. Within the app you could adjust the point value of the success question, “Do you plan to attend Dreamforce?” 

The system then would alert all customers that an engagement question has an increased point value incentivizing the customer to log in and supply the answer.

Engager uses Heroku connect to get your customer success data into your Salesforce instance where you can build dashboards and reports to take action on your findings. 

Now customer success data can be used to empower sales, marketing, support, and finance in ways that seemed impossible before.


##Technical Brief

[![Deploy](https://www.herokucdn.com/deploy/button.png)](https://heroku.com/deploy?template=https://github.com/gonimbly/engager-api/tree/master) *Engager API*

[![Deploy](https://www.herokucdn.com/deploy/button.png)](https://heroku.com/deploy?template=https://github.com/gonimbly/engager-ui/tree/master) *Engager UI*

Built on Heroku with Nodejs and React/HTML/CSS, deliver value to your customer and your organization simultaneously. Rewards architecture to give valuable services to your customer. Seamless integration of key customer insights to your Sales Reps and Marketers with Heroku Connect. Configurable engagement tools stored in Postgres database to quickly and independently adapt to new markets.

####Features
- Rewards architecture with Uber/Lyft/Scoot
- Notifications engine through SMS
- Heroku Connect gives your Sales Reps Key Customer Activity records for easy reporting in Salesforce
- 100% Open Source stack
- Modern UI with React
- Render customer success questionnaire
- Configurable customer success questionnaire
